page.title: 13COUNTRY LIFE
page.content: We did a survey with 30 juniors. We asked them if they would like to live in the country or town. 29 people said the country, and 1 said the town. The second question was why did you choose that? They were: peacefulness 80%, space 48%, and no traffic 36%. The third question was what do you think people who live in the town would like to do in the country? They were: wildlife 62%, visiting farms 36%, and picnics 36%. The fourth question was what do you think you would like to do in the holidays in a town? The replies were parks 80%, shopping 70%, and swimming 33%. The fifth question was when and if you get married, where would you like to live? 27 people said the country and 3 people said the town.
